item.title: Who Owns Somalia’s External Debt?
item.description: Somalia’s external debt belongs to 27 known creditors comprised of three categories: Paris Club bilateral debt ($2.5 billion, 54%), non-Paris Club bilateral creditors ($600 million, 13%) and international financial institutions such as World Bank, IMF and others ($1.5 billion, 33%).
